modShortDescription: Chaos Bike! You may recognise the bike or you may not but it's better to ride past the dead than walk.
modDescription:
This is Ragsy’s first attempt in unity at putting a motorcycle into the game although he has been known to like tweaking the original vanilla [motorcycle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-motorcycle/) physics xml and this bike incorperates some of what was learned along the way from the xml tweaking adventures.

## Chaos Bike

You may recognise the bike or you may not but it’s better to ride past the dead than walk.

### Crafting Method

You can find the base chassis, seat and handlebar assembly in loot at the appropriate level (same as Vanilla Motorcycle).

Recipes are also included to be able to craft the parts on a workbench if required or you are darned unlucky not to find them, once you have a completed chassis assembly you will have to craft an engine.

The Chaos engine comprises of 2x small engines and some other parts, add wheels along with the engine to the completed chassis and you can complete the [bike](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) in the workbench.

The bike actually has 6 slots not 4 as in picture above.

## Changelog

**Version 2**

1. Added the new vehicle mods options, seat, fuel saver, offroad lighting and turbo charger to bike all except the cosmetic option.
2. Converted to new seating system so will accept a second seat through the mods (old seat system still in xml incase of multiplayer issue)
3. Updated physics as felt a bit different in A20 compared to A19… cure that wobbly effect the vanilla one has.

**Mod is required on both client and server as per all mods that contain custom assets.**
